channel.title: [req] player rights to wear items?
channel.description:
ok iv seen on some servers that you need
player rites 1 to were white phat and player rites 2 to were yellow.
so i wanted to add this similar thing to my server. only 1 problem how would i add it to that certan item because it would have to be done in the client.java and for all i know there are no items in there..
so if any 1 can help please post. ty.
